selectedVerses.text: The king called loudly to bring in the enchanters, the Chaldeans, and the astrologers. The king declared to the wise men of Babylon, "Whoever reads this writing, and shows me its interpretation, shall be clothed with purple and have a chain of gold around his neck and shall be the third ruler in the kingdom."
He lived among the tombs. And no one could bind him anymore, not even with a chain,
Then I saw an angel coming down from heaven, holding in his hand the key to the bottomless pit and a great chain.
And I adorned you with ornaments and put bracelets on your wrists and a chain on your neck.
Then Belshazzar gave the command, and Daniel was clothed with purple, a chain of gold was put around his neck, and a proclamation was made about him, that he should be the third ruler in the kingdom.
